DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , randomized trial 180 adult age 65-74 year evaluate immune response standard dose , high dose , adjuvanted influenza vaccine across 2 season . Participants randomize receive 1 3 license recommend vaccine pre post-vaccination serum blood draw total 6 draw 18 month .
